availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Sidney M. Bailey (Scott County, Kentucky, student and soldier)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, student and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Colton Bailey and Sarah Bailey. Attended school in Scott County, Kentucky, in 1850. Served in the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from September 22, 1862 to February 13, 1864. Captured at Monroe County, Tennessee on October 20, 1863. Prisoner of war from October 20, 1863 to February 13, 1864. Died in Richmond, Virginia, on February 13, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 1, p. 438B-439A.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers Who Served in Organizations From the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0105.
